meanings.sent1: The long wait in line was disgruntling the customers.
meanings.sent2: The noisy neighbors were disgruntling the peaceful atmosphere of the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The constant rain disgruntled the picnic plans.
meanings.sent4: The never-ending traffic jam disgruntled the commuters.
meanings.sent5: The lack of communication from the management disgruntled the employees.
